sub_title: QA Sr Specialist | Pharmacist | BioPharma Operations | Compliance
summary:
Results-driven Quality Assurance professional with a passion for ensuring quality and regulatory compliance in the biopharmaceutical industry. As a self-motivated and adaptable individual, I have a strong interest in driving quality improvement initiatives, ensuring patient safety and delivering exceptional results.

I have successfully led investigations on high-impact product complaints and deviations, identified root causes, and implemented effective corrective and preventive actions. My dedication to excellence has resulted in improved investigations and enhanced patient experiences.

Currently, as a Sr Specialist Quality Complaints at Amgen Europe B.V., I continue to drive quality improvement initiatives and support regulatory audits. I am skilled in managing multiple activities, providing guidance to colleagues, and ensuring timely deliverables.

Looking to the future, I am eager to take on new challenges and contribute to the success of organizations in the quality assurance field. I am dedicated to expanding my expertise in areas such as regulatory compliance, pharmacovigilance and continuous improvement methodologies to contribute to the success of organizations. With my strong organizational, project management, and leadership skills, I am well-equipped to tackle problems and advance organizational strategies.

With excellent communication, decision-making, and interpersonal skills, I thrive in collaborative environments. My involvement in professional associations such as the International Pharmaceutical Federation (FIP) and the Project Management Institute (PMI) further showcases my commitment to staying at the forefront of industry trends.

Beyond my professional achievements, I enjoy exploring avenues of creative growth (check out my podcast "Convos Under the Baobab Tree"), learning new languages (targeting Dutch B2 proficiency), and football (hope to watch Manchester United at Old Trafford soon).

Personal Motto: "So that others may live"

profile_positions.description:
Ensuring compliance of marketed biopharmaceutical products in EMEAA region to regulatory guidelines by:
I. Leading and managing product complaint/product security/safety quality/trend and consolidated investigations.
II. Product quality surveillance and risk management.
III. Implementing corrective action and process improvement initiatives. 
IV. Supporting personal and team continuous education.
